name: notion-mcp-server
description: MCP server for the Notion API - search, read, create, and update pages and data sources
long_description: Official Notion MCP server that enables AI assistants to interact with your Notion workspace. Search across pages and databases, read and create content, manage data sources (databases), and organize your workspace programmatically.

tools.name: post-search
tools.description: Search across all pages and data sources in your Notion workspace

tools.name: retrieve-a-page
tools.description: Get the content and properties of a specific page

tools.name: retrieve-a-page-property
tools.description: Get a specific property value from a page

tools.name: patch-page
tools.description: Update the properties of an existing page

tools.name: post-page
tools.description: Create a new page in a parent page or data source

tools.name: move-page
tools.description: Move a page to a different parent location

tools.name: retrieve-a-block
tools.description: Get a specific block by ID

tools.name: update-a-block
tools.description: Update a block's content

tools.name: delete-a-block
tools.description: Delete a block by ID

tools.name: get-block-children
tools.description: Get the child blocks of a block or page

tools.name: patch-block-children
tools.description: Add new blocks as children of a block or page

tools.name: get-user
tools.description: Get information about a specific user

tools.name: get-users
tools.description: List all users in the workspace

tools.name: get-self
tools.description: Get information about the current bot user

tools.name: retrieve-a-comment
tools.description: Get a specific comment by ID

tools.name: create-a-comment
tools.description: Add a comment to a page or block

tools.name: query-data-source
tools.description: Query a data source (database) with filters and sorts

tools.name: retrieve-a-data-source
tools.description: Get metadata and schema for a data source

tools.name: update-a-data-source
tools.description: Update data source properties

tools.name: create-a-data-source
tools.description: Create a new data source

tools.name: list-data-source-templates
tools.description: List available templates in a data source
